Address.value: 50 EXECUTIVE PARKWAY,P.O. BOX 2520, HUDSON, Ohio, 44236-1605, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Diebold Nixdorf Inc is engaged in providing software and hardware services for financial and retail industries. The customer segments of the company are banking which offers integrated solutions for financial institutions and retail that offers solutions, software, and services which improves the checkout process for retailers.
